entry.title: Hiring now - Director - Graphic Design (Digital and Print Media)
entry.content:
Director - Graphic Design (Digital and Print Media)
Full-time job
Package 3-6 Lacs Per Annum (INR)

Location - Remote / Work from Home

Role
- Responsible for timely delivery of CultureDabba magazine
- Defines the overall art style and quality of production
- Mentors team members to produce quality deliverables
- Escalation point for the team

Requirements (Must have)
- An online portfolio - Applications without Portfolio will NOT be considered
- 3+ years of experience in magazine publication for children or equivalent experience in print / digital media
- Willing to be a 100% dedicated, full-time employee - No part-timers or freelancers
- Self-disciplined to Work from home

Company:
CultureDabba is a Chicago-based start-up working on some exciting products for the NRI Kids.

We are looking for someone with a deep understanding and skill in graphic designing, print, and digital (ePub) media. We expect you to be a Master Chef with Adobe Ai, Id and Photoshop.

Interested? Please send us a link to your Portfolio/sample work at info@culturedabba.com or on https://facebook/culturedabba

entry.title: Join the CD Team - Graphic Designer
entry.content:
Do you want to work for a US based Startup? Do you stay up awake in bed thinking about how to change the world with brilliant design? If you adore the work that Disney, Apple, Lego, IKEA, Tiffany’s or Tesla does...keep reading?

CultureDabba is a Chicago-based start-up working on some exciting products for the American consumers.

We are looking for someone with a deep understanding and skill in graphic designing, print, and digital (ePub) media. We expect you to be a Master Chef with Adobe Ai, Id and all things in Adobe CC and have a #Kickass, #NeverSayQuit attitude.

We pay competitively and offer mobile connectivity/data plan etc. as perks. Also, we are totally remote and global. Live in your parent’s basement or work from a digital nomadic camp in Bali, whatever works for you.

Ohh...and we don’t care if you can speak English or not as long as you can speak design. Interested? Send us a link to your Portfolio/sample work to info@culturedabba.com. Come grow with us.

entry.title: Are you a Designer + Writer + Ideator + Perfectionist? Come on over!
entry.summary:
Need a prolific creative designer, writer, ideator and technologist for a Chicago based Start-up. Check our titles on Amazon

More
entry.content:
Need a prolific creative designer, writer, ideator and technologist. We are a fast growing content creation company based out of Chicago. We author ebooks for kids. Check our titles on Amazon 

We are a start-up and need young, energetic and eager to learn professionals.

Only apply if you believe you can take extreme pressure and ready to slog. If you are an average professional, you would barely survive with us....so do not waste your and our time. #BestinClass #Perfectionists

Here is a sample of what we are upto...

entry.title: Help needed - Short Story Writer!
entry.summary:
CultureDabba is looking for a short story writer. These stories are inspired by Indian Culture, Mythology and Folklore.

More
entry.content:
CultureDabba is looking for a short story writer. These stories are inspired by Indian Culture, Mythology and Folklore.

You would be expected to re-write these in a contemporary style for an international reader in the age groups of 5-10 years.

Some examples would be Tenali Rama, Jatak Katha, Akbar Birbal etc. Interested? Message us on Facebook.com/CultureDabba
